New design hand drawing of the product âœï¸
Collages of the product âœ‚ï¸
Animation or vlog videos ğŸ¥
Usage tips or blog posts âœï¸
Special Reminder:
Creative, beautiful and content-rich works will be prioritized for selection and have the opportunity to be published and promoted on the company's official social media and private platforms.
The selected works will not only get public exposure, but the best ones will also receive generous gifts as a token of appreciation and recognition!
How to submit: Send your work to @MaYuYang (Maria) via DingTalk.
Deadline: 6:30 p.m. on October 14th!
